alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 28 at 12:15PM PST until March 02 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM WEDNESDAY TO 4 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In California, Owens Valley, White Mountains of Inyo County and Death Valley National Park. In Nevada, Esmeralda and Central Nye County. * WHEN...From 7 AM Wednesday to 4 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
